Html:
Really awesome work!
 
Thank you for sharing this - especially thank you for the Silverlight version.
 
What are your plans for a 3D version of Dynamic Data Display?
 
Check out the very nice 3D work "High performance WPF 3D Chart"  - http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WPFChart3D.aspx
 
David Roh
McKinney, Texas
JK1@SoftwareByDavid.com

Hi David,

Thank you for rating our work highly.

We have some plans about 3D in D3, but currently they are not very clear for me. In several moths we will, as I think, support surfaces in 3D, markers and maybe something additional; but no precise dates and features for now.

Regards,

Mikhail Brinchuk.
